articles.title: Biden Announces All Adults In US Eligible For Covid Vaccine By April 19 - NDTV
articles.description: President Joe Biden announced Tuesday that all adults across America will be eligible for Covid-19 shots within two weeks, while economic powerhouse California set a June 15 target to fully reopen businesses.
articles.content:
Joe Biden announced that all adults across America will be eligible for Covid-19 shots within two weeks.

articles.title: Police, communities across US fight back against anti-Asian hate crimes - Rappler
articles.description: A Center for the Study of Hate and Extremism report shows that while hate crimes overall in the US had fallen slightly in 2020, crimes against Asian Americans and Pacific Islanders had jumped by 145%
